name: Welcome To Heaven (itch) (Piepscho)
description:
You have always been a good one, but heaven is about to get full. You have to take drastic action to save your place in it.

Other good people will let you pass, if you ask them politely (right arrow key).
Bad people won't... So you have to be more stubborn (left arrow key).

The aureoles will tell you wether someone is bad or good. So keep a good look, use your memories and don't make mistakes - Saint Peter is watching.

Concept by hanabi immerglück
Designs by hanabi immerglück and Möhrenherz
Sound by Feivel
Programmed by me
